thread.title: REFILE-Dell offering EMC $27.25 per share and special VMware stock - Re/code
thread.title_full: REFILE-Dell offering EMC $27.25 per share and special VMware stock - Re/code | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: REFILE-Dell offering EMC $27.25 per share and special VMware stock - Re/code
text:
(Corrects ticker symbol for VMware in paragraph 2)
Oct 9 (Reuters) - Dell Inc is offering $27.25 per share in cash for data storage company EMC Corp, Re/code reported on Friday, citing sources briefed on the negotiations.
Shareholders will also get a specialized stock in cloud software company VMware Inc as part of the deal, Re/code reported. ( on.recode.net/1GAOQEY )
EMC and Dell were not immediately available for comment. (Reporting by Anya George Tharakan in Bengaluru; Editing by Don Sebastian)
